dict.acceptation: 详细的，明细的；精细的；复杂的；详尽的；

sent.orig: A detailed, complete, detailed and in-depth.
Composition and preparation of discharge paste, auxiliary selection and processing conditions are detailed in this paper.
sent.trans: 文中介绍了拔染浆的组成与配制、助剂的选用及工艺条件。

sent.orig: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.
sent.trans: 哥伦布按顺序仔细而详尽地记载了他的各次航程。

sent.orig: With detailed veins, natural texture, color is the red colour of the ten best new clothing.
sent.trans: 拥有细密纹理，自然质感，色泽柔和的壁布便是墙面最佳的新装。

sent.orig: The welding procedure of main pressure parts, its bulk heat treatment and checking point are detailed.
sent.trans: 详细介绍了主要受压件的焊接工艺、整体消除焊接应力热处理技术以及关键的检验控制点。
